column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If you are going on a trip to Chicago
column2: you need to try some deep dish Pizza.  Much different from our thin crust in NY
column3: this pizza takes a full 45 minutes to cook.  The place to go for this is not Pizzeria Uno (which originated in Chicago)
column5: this family owned and operated chain is now 33 Restaurants strong.  The location Carol and I frequent when we go to Chicago is The River North Location on North Wells Street.
